content: free by halime özel @handmade_by_halime pattern the ankylosaurus tom anks dear abbreviations crochet lover chain = chain/s single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase crochet 2 single_crochet in the much love time and effort have been put same stitch into designing this amigurumi creation decrease = decrease crochet 2 single_crochet together and i would appreciate if you please bobble = bobble stitch give credit to me and add the following round = round s note to your item … x x = repeat instructions in pattern by @handmade_by_halime brackets x times this pattern is for personal use only = total number of stitches in the round or row chains not counted i m more than happy for you to gift materials required or sell any items made from this pattern yarn i used sport weight 5 ply but would love it if you could credit me cotton yarn drops safran as a the designer crochet hook 2 5 mm fibrefill / toy stuffing never hesitate to contact me through my stitch markers scissor and instagram account and i will do my best embroidery needle to help you security eyes 7 mm enjoy this pattern size with love halime 16 cm in length 6 cm in height when using yarn and hook mentioned above click here to save the pattern for later head start with beige color round 12 2 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet x 5 decrease 2 single_crochet 30 make 7 chains round 13 30 single_crochet 30 round 1 start on the second chain from round 14 3 single_crochet decrease x 6 24 the hook 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in last chain turn and work on the opposite side of the chain stuff the head with filling keep rest of 4 single_crochet increase 14 the rounds after back loops flat round 2 increase 4 single_crochet increase x 3 4 single_crochet increase x 2 20 round 15 this round in back loops round 3 20 single_crochet 20 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 round 4 1 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet round 16 1 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 change to mossgreen color 3 single_crochet increase round 17 decrease x 6 6 1 single_crochet 24 round 5 3 single_crochet increase x 6 30 fasten_off and leave a long tail to sew to round 6-8 30 single_crochet 3 rounds 30 the body round 9 2 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet x 5 increase 2 single_crochet 36 round 10-11 36 single_crochet 2 rounds 36 place 7 mm security eyes between round 7 and 8 it should be 11 stitches between the eyes note the distance is important otherwise the head shield will not fit if you are un-sure make the head shield before attaching the eyes where the color change from beige to mossgreen should be the bottom of the head @handmade_by_halime body work with mossgreen color round 22 3 single_crochet decrease x 6 24 make 9 chains round 23 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 round 1 start on
